Job Description: In this role, you will:    Following an agile methodology, participate in the functional, architecture and technical design of our products for Jira Server and Data Center     Participate in the product implementation, in compliance with the development rules set forth within the organization     Participate in the evaluation and selection of third-party components and technologies     Work with product management to understand requirements and design solutions that meet those requirements     Apply analytical and problem-solving skills to solve complex design and coding challenges     Work as a valued team player in a fast-paced environment in small teams where shipping early and shipping often is a primary driver for adding value   Required:    A strong depth of knowledge and experience in Java 8+     Strong knowledge of Html/CSS, JavaScript, and at least one UI framework (jQuery, AUI, React)     Very strong software coding skills, design patterns experience     Great creative and innovative problem-solving skills     Working knowledge of software build, packaging, release management using Maven     Ability to learn and work with new technologies quickly     Experience with agile software development methodologies      Good communication skills and written English     Should be an autonomous and self-organizing individual     Should work to achieve assigned targets with best quality of code with team goals in mind     Sharp and quick learner of new technologies     A passion for developing software products     5 years minimum of experience in software development with proven technical skills   Desirable:    Experience developing apps for the Atlassian server and data center products (Jira preferred)     Accreditations or certifications for Atlassian applications including Confluence and Jira      Experience with GIT, Maven     Knowledge of the Atlassian ecosystem (e.g. the P2 APIs)     Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science (or equivalent)
